name: Mini-Moni. Step Pyon Pyon Pyon
overview: Mini Moni: Step Pyon Pyon Pyon is a game similar to the Bishi Bashi games also published by Konami but this one also contains a board game. Play modes: - Board game: In this mode you play in a board throwing the dice and using cards - Minigames mode: You have to play the 44 minigames one by one until you complete all - Play one of the eight modes of minigames only: In this category you play the minigames if you select one of the top four that Yago ,Kago,Tsugi or Mika are the games that each girl will select if she organized the tournament. If you select the bottom are different styles hit the button,reflex,intelligent and vs . - Dance mode: In this mode you play a dance dance revolution style game. - Option mode
